helper.formatting.textannotation

Interface Annotator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnnotatorBGColor, AnnotatorFGColor, AnnotatorMonospace, AnnotatorUnderline, AnnotatorWType

    public interface Annotator
    Annotator for a text fragment; used to highlight it in some way
    Author:
    Moritz Dorka
